phrases: trespassers reported in the 20th Ward at the Aqua Building.
Trespassers are believed to be ghouls- repeat, ghouls.
It looks like they were not kidding when they called you a binge eater.
I hate being interrupted when I am eating.
You do not know me, do you?
You are a joyless fellow that enjoys bothering others.
I have got orders from above.
I am supposed to take you alive.
But then, before I do, I can take a finger or two,
an arm or two, a leg or two...
You do not mind, do you?
A small toy for such a big body.
I will bet you like playing house.
I am not going to play with you.
Early this morning, several unidentified male bodies
were discovered in the Aqua Building,
a commercial facility in Tokyo's 20th Ward.
What is believed to be saliva belonging to ghouls
and the incident is being investigated as a ghoul crime.
and the incident is being investigated as a ghoul crime.
It is not that funny, is it?
I am just saying, you cannot have a first date at a bookstore, right?
She might be thrilled, you know!
I will state for the record, that will not happen.
Then first, I will take her out to Big Girl, just the two of us,
and we will get a burger.
I am giving you a serious answer.
It is great, just like you!
But as a date, it will be a flop.
What, is everything I do wrong?
What, is everything I do wrong?
You have to choose a place
where the girl will be pleased when making a date.
Hide, you do not even know.
Hide, you do not even know.
-I would not be here spending my afternoon off like this -These last few days have seen a string
-of predatory ghoul attacks in the 20th Ward,
-of predatory ghoul attacks in the 20th Ward,
and according to CCG's 20th Ward Branch,
they are investigating the possibility that the incidents
they are investigating the possibility that the incidents
-are the result of the same culprit.
-I am not done with this, yet.
And also, what is your name?
If I get kicked out of here, then what do I do?!
This shop is the one place where she and I both-
You and her would be Beauty and whatever.
Now that I have seen you lovelorn,
Now that I have seen you lovelorn,
I think I will be off.
I guess sometimes you get lucky.
Imagine, liking the same novelist that I do!
We are going to go to the bookstore together this coming Sunday.
I am not sure how good a bookstore date is going to be,
I have to say, this is getting ugly.
Word is that eating one person is supposed to last them a month,
but these binge eaters are something else.
and they would eat any number of people, would not they?
They are worse than livestock, since they are not good for anything.
Mr. Kaneki, what is your favorite work by Takatsuki?
It would have to be his debut book.
It was a breakout hit, after all.
The delicacy amidst all the extremeness, you might say.
To have that much talent in writing,
and still be in his teens when it came out-
Miss Rize, you do not eat much, do you?
Actually, um, I am on a dietary regimen...
Excuse me, I need the restroom.
Thank you very much for today.
The truth is, I... live near where these recent incidents have been...
I am awfully bad at handling this.
Just thinking about it even now, I cannot stop from trembling.
Yes, so then Hide asked me, Which do you like better, me or novels?
He sounds like a funny person.
Was there something that served to turn you on to books?
My dad left us a lot of books in our house.
I lost my dad before I can even remember.
I liked the books he left,
and while my mom was out working, I spent the time reading them.
Then, ever since my mom died...
You know, Hide is the only one I have ever told this to.
Well, I am right over here, so...
Um, if you would not mind, can I see you again?
We do have a similar taste in books, and we are the same age...
There is a lot we have in common, huh?
The truth is, I noticed you.
The way you were looking at me.
there is something I like even more than reading.
It is pulling out all the organs of someone
who is not trying to run away from me.
I am going to gently scramble up your insides for you now, okay?
There is just the right amount of fat on you;
you look nice and soft, and easy to eat.
I thought I was on a date with Miss Rize...
Without the consent of the next of kin?
What exactly are they talking about?
Is this all you are going to eat?
Your friend came by again today.
I hear you have not eaten anything since you were admitted,
but there does not particularly seem to be anything wrong.
my sense of taste... is not right...
It is like everything tastes icky...
That could be psychological in nature.
It was a pretty serious accident, after all.
Take all the time you need to heal.
I will be by again later.
It almost seems like the events of that whole day with Miss Rize
were something that never really happened.
But one thing is for sure...
Ever since then, something has been...
Presenting some leftover high-quality ingredients from my place,
It is rough here on my own.
A ghoul does not have any need to eat this much
in this short amount of time in the first place.
One dead body will allow them to survive for a month or two.
One dead body will allow them to survive for a month or two.
One dead body will allow them to survive for a month or two.
Mr. Ogura, cannot ghouls be satisfied
by eating the same food as humans do?
No, ghouls are only able to derive their nutrition from people.
Not to mention that their tongues work differently than ours do.
Not to mention that their tongues work differently than ours do.
Not to mention that their tongues work differently than ours do.
it tastes incredibly awful to them.
Their tongues work differently than ours do...
It tastes incredibly awful to them...
Did you go out and buy this just for me?
He was supposed to get out of the hospital today,
I went to see him several times, too,
If it were me I would cut off ties with anyone as rude as that.
Kaneki and I have been best friends since we were kids.
I was just at the bookstore
in front of the station, and Akatsuki what is-his-name
is doing a book signing, so I thought I would tell you.
Anyhow, give me a call when you are feeling better.
The Akatsuki Sen book signing is now over.
Do not get involved, you dummy!
I know what is causing it!
Blades such as knives or kitchenware cannot hurt them.
What am I supposed to do now?
Kill a person... take their flesh!
It is almost as though I am...
It is the first time I am smelling it, but it seems so familiar...
A sweet aroma, like Mom's home cooking...
There is something over here that even I can eat!
How could I have been enticed here by the scent of a corpse?!
It is been a long time for me,
so I cannot share too much with you,
do not go plundering my feeding grounds.
I have never seen you before.
For that matter, why is only one of your eyes red?
You know what you get for looting someone else's territory, right?
I just happened to be passing by...
Your girlfriend is naked and lying on the ground.
Then someone else there with his pants down says to you,
I just happened to be here.
That is the same as what you are telling me.
If it were me, I would kill the guy.
That is why I am killing you,
as punishment for trespassing on my feeding grounds-
Whose feeding grounds, did you say?
Since when were these your feeding grounds,
I know she is dead, right?
And that makes these your feeding grounds?
The task of distributing the feeding grounds Rize stole
to the weaker ghouls, and otherwise managing the 20th Ward...
belongs to those of us at Anteiku.
A bunch of fence-sitters like Anteiku
have no right to go picking over every little thing!
This was my feeding ground in the first place, before Rize came-
Being insulted by a smart-mouthed punk younger than I am
is something that really pisses me off.
You will have to cut deeper than that!
Can I go even harder next time?
Take your corpse with you, beansprout.
Then again, only one of your eyes is different...
You are the one who was with Rize.
I know you may not believe this, but I am human.
I want to eat it so bad I cannot help it...
I will not be human anymore!
If you are in that much pain, then eat.
There is no way I can eat something like that, right?
What is it to be a ghoul?
If you do not have the nerve to eat...
then I will give you a hand!
